header: My goals by the end of this week, month, and year.

content:
Finish my portfolio site and get it prepared for the addition of Javascript where needed.

Research Craft CMS for the creation of a project that can utlize it.

Complete the JS dom lesson and the next one after that.

Reach out to the top 3 companies on my short list with an application and my completed portfolio.

Complete a fullstack project that uses JS and a CMS.

Implement the next version of the design for my portfolio site.

Begin learning a JS framework and build on my portfolio site and CMS project with it.

Start my first developer role and learn a lot more about the design and development process.

Become a CSS and JS wizard.

Dive into hard DS problems and sail through my algorithms text book.
